{"id":888746370,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 2 weeks","timestamp":1675170474,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"80 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/888746370/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"43.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    \n    Map<Character,Integer> map = new HashMap<>();\n\n    public int lengthOfLongestSubstring(String s) {\n        int ans = 0, prev = 0;\n        resetMap();\n\n        for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++){\n            if(map.containsKey(s.charAt(i))){\n\n                ans = Math.max(ans, i-prev);\n\n                int tmp = map.get( s.charAt(i) ) + 1;\n                prev = tmp;\n                \n                resetMap();\n                while(tmp <= i){\n                    map.put( s.charAt(tmp) , tmp);\n                    tmp++;\n                }\n            }\n            else{\n                map.put(s.charAt(i) , i);\n            }\n        }\n\n        return Math.max(ans, s.length()-prev);\n    }\n\n    private void resetMap(){\n        map.clear();\n    }\n\n}\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false}
